product_name: Sugoi Evo Classic Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Sugoi Evo Classic bike jersey delivers cool comfort with a tuned fit and performance fabric, letting you focus on the ride ahead of you. Polyester fabric helps ensure moisture-wicking and quick-drying comfort. Strategically placed mesh panels optimize cooling airflow and breathability. Contoured seams on the sleeves and shoulders offer a comfortable fit when you're in the riding position. Full-length zipper enables easy, on-the-go ventilation control. The Sugoi Evo Classic bike jersey features a back pocket to stash riding essentials. Closeout.
short_description: The Sugoi Evo Classic bike jersey delivers cool comfort with a tuned fit and performance fabric, letting you focus on the ride ahead of you.
